overview: Geeta University spans across 40 acres of green campus with modern infrastructure, blending academic excellence with cutting-edge technology as India's first AI-powered university.

infrastructure.title: Smart Classrooms
infrastructure.description: Spacious, air-conditioned smart classrooms equipped with projectors, LED displays, and modern teaching aids. AI-powered digital attendance system syncs immediately with student data for transparency.

infrastructure.title: Laboratories
infrastructure.description: State-of-the-art labs for Engineering, Computer Science, Pharmacy, Agriculture, Forensic Sciences, and Allied Health Sciences. Equipped with latest equipment and technology for hands-on practical learning and research.

infrastructure.title: Central Library
infrastructure.description: Well-stocked resourceful library with extensive collection of books, journals, research papers, and digital resources. Features quiet reading zones, e-library access, and study spaces. Open from morning to evening with extended hours during exams.

infrastructure.title: Auditorium
infrastructure.description: Grand auditorium with spacious seating arrangement and well-established IT infrastructure for seminars, conferences, cultural events, guest lectures, and convocations. Equipped with modern audio-visual systems.

infrastructure.title: Computer Labs
infrastructure.description: Advanced computer labs with high-speed internet connectivity, latest software, and hardware. Dedicated labs for programming, AI/ML, data science, cyber security, and software development projects.

infrastructure.title: GTH Lab
infrastructure.description: Specialized Growth, Technology and Innovation Hub (GTH) lab for students to develop technical skills, work on innovative projects, and learn emerging technologies through practical applications.

facilities.title: Hostels
facilities.description: Separate AC and Non-AC hostels for boys and girls with modern amenities including furnished rooms, study areas, recreational facilities, and 24/7 security. Hygienic mess providing nutritious food with varied menu options.

facilities.title: Cafeteria
facilities.description: Multi-cuisine cafeteria serving healthy, hygienic, and delicious food with variety of options including North Indian, South Indian, Chinese, and continental dishes. Clean dining environment with affordable pricing.

facilities.title: Transport
facilities.description: University-operated bus facility available from major cities including Delhi, Panipat, Karnal, and nearby areas. Safe and comfortable transportation with regular routes ensuring convenient commute for students.

facilities.title: Sports Complex
facilities.description: Extensive sports facilities spread over 10+ acres including cricket ground, football field, basketball court, volleyball court, badminton courts, and athletics track. Indoor games facilities for chess, carrom, and table tennis.

facilities.title: Gymnasium
facilities.description: Well-equipped modern gymnasium with cardio machines, weight training equipment, and fitness accessories. Professional trainers available to guide students on health and fitness routines.

facilities.title: Wi-Fi Campus
facilities.description: Entire campus is Wi-Fi enabled with high-speed internet connectivity, allowing students to access digital learning resources, online libraries, and educational platforms from anywhere on campus.

facilities.title: Medical Facilities
facilities.description: On-campus medical facility with qualified healthcare professionals available for emergencies and regular health checkups. Tie-ups with nearby hospitals for specialized medical care.

facilities.title: ATM and Banking
facilities.description: ATM facilities available on campus for convenient banking transactions. Partnerships with banks for easy payment of fees through installments and third-party arrangements.

technology_features: Smart learning platforms and management systems
Transparent digital systems for all operations
ERP system for students, parents, and faculty
